title: DeFUN The Whites w/ Aba from “Aba & Preach”
itunes:author: Andrew Schulz's Flagrant with Akaash Singh
itunes:summary:
This week Andrew Schulz, Akaash Singh, AlexxMedia and Mark Gagnon are joined by Aba Atlas (from Aba and Preach)to discuss canceling scientist, if defunding the police saves black lives, Nancy Pelosi out Trumped Trump, white people hijacking BLM protest, corporations don't really care about the Black Lives Matter movement and much more. INDULGE!

Want an extra episode a week? Join the Flagrant Army
